name: Don't Think Twice
description:
Created in the Yogscast Game Jam 2020 (48 Hours) 

A TopDown Rage Game where the player has to complete all the levels Via landing on the landing Pads while getting attacked by different projectiles. You gotta hurry, don’t let the music stop.

The Jam was a lot of fun and  wish to participate in the next one

(Made with Gdevelop 5)
